property.name: zoneName
property.label: Zone Name
property.description: Ideas Zone Name

property.name: variant
property.label: Display Option
property.description: Select the default format of the card. Options are: None (flat) or Featured (drop shadow), Outline (flat with border).

property.name: displayPostDateAuthor
property.label: Display Post Date and Author
property.description: Display the idea post date and author name

property.name: displayCategories
property.label: Display Idea Categories
property.description: When enabled, displays the assigned Idea Category on the detail page.

property.name: displayTheme
property.label: Display Idea Theme
property.description: When enabled, displays the associated Idea Theme on the detail page.

property.name: allowExploreIdeas
property.label: Enable Explore More Ideas
property.description: Enable the Explore more Ideas link

property.name: canFollow
property.label: Enable Follow Button
property.description: Hide follow button if tracking is not required in the community

property.name: canEdit
property.label: Enable Edit Button
property.description: Check to enable the edit button

property.name: canDelete
property.label: Enable Delete Button
property.description: Check to enable the delete button

property.name: editMyIdea
property.label: Edit/Delete My Ideas Only
property.description: Check to limit user edit and delete to own ideas only - object access permissions still apply

property.name: ideaDetailURL
property.label: Idea Detail Page API Name
property.description: Enter the API name for the Idea Detail page. API name can be found in page properties and shall include '__c'.

property.name: ideaNewURL
property.label: Idea Create Edit Page API Name
property.description: Enter the API name for the Idea Create Edit page. API name can be found in page properties and shall include '__c'.

property.name: ideasListURL
property.label: Idea List Page API Name
property.description: Enter the API name for the Idea List page. API name can be found in page properties and shall include '__c'.

property.name: customClass
property.label: Custom Class
property.description: Used for custom styling.
